author: mr.mietrich
title: Be a Tree! - The Tree Simulator!!
description: Common knowledge about trees and their needs, importance + uniqueness is rare. Millions of people cannot distinguish one tree from another.
solution: Build a 3D tree simulator for players to grow their own NFTrees from seed to giant, while giving climate-focused non-profits visibility.
experience: UX/UI, Full-Stack Dev, Plutus Pioneer, Generative Artist, Procedural Modeling, Cultural Scientist, Treegenerates
